# For this table we use the initial value tau=0.6, omega=0.9, kappa=2.1, inibl=0.1, which is the defalut value in Xiang's software.
I changed the column name since we swapped them. The original names should be "ll (N2,ENSDARG,1->2) (N6,ENSGACG,1->2) (N2,ENSDARG,2->1) (N6,ENSGACG,2->1)" for the first 5 columns.

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
newSwcase2 <- swcase2[c(2, 48, 51, 64, 67),] %>% t() %>% as.matrix()
newMg <- MG[c(2, 48, 51, 64, 67),] %>% t() %>% as.matrix()
swCompare <- cbind(newSwcase2, newMg) %>% as.data.frame()
row.names(swCompare) <- List
colnames(swCompare) <- c("swap-ll", "ENSGACG01 -> ENSDARG02", "ENSDARG01 -> ENSGACG02", "ENSDARG02 -> ENSGACG01", "ENSGACG02 -> ENSDARG01", "ll", "ENSDARG 01->02", "ENSGACG 01->02", "ENSDARG 02->01", "ENSGACG 02->01")
datatable(swCompare) %>%
  formatRound(1:10, 3)

```
